thread.title: Punjab & Haryana High Court Recruitment 2017 – Apply Online for 229 Stenographer Gr III Posts
thread.title_full: Punjab & Haryana High Court Recruitment 2017 – Apply Online for 229 Stenographer Gr III Posts

author: publisher12
title: Punjab & Haryana High Court Recruitment 2017 – Apply Online for 229 Stenographer Gr III Posts

organizations.name: stenographer gr iii posts punjab & haryana high court
society for centralized recruitment of staff in subordinate courts

text: Punjab & Haryana High Court Recruitment 2017 – Apply Online for 229 Stenographer Gr III Posts Punjab & Haryana High Court Recruitment 2017 – Apply Online for 229 Stenographer Gr III Posts: Society for Centralized Recruitment of Staff in Subordinate Courts, Punjab & Haryana High Court has issued a notification for the recruitment of 229 Stenographer Grade-III vacancies in Subordinate Courts under High Court of Punjab and Haryana (S.S.S.C.). Eligible candidates can apply online from 20-03-2017 to 18-04-2017 by 11.59 PM. Other details like age limit, educational qualification, selection process, application fee & how to apply are given below… Punjab & Haryana High Court Vacancy Details: Total No.of Posts: 229 Name of the Posts: Stenographer Grade-III 1. Gen: 51 Posts 2. SC of Punjab: 81 Posts 3. BC/ OBC of Punjab: 22 Posts 4. PHC of Punjab: 20 Posts 5. ESM: 55 Posts Age Limit: Candidates age should be between 18-37 years for General, 18-42 years for SC of Punjab, BC/ OBC of Punjab, 18-45 years for Candidates who are already in service in Government/ Semi/ PSU as on 01-01-2017 & for more information refer the notification. Educational Qualification: Candidates should possess degree of Bachelor of Arts or Bachelor of Science or equivalent thereto from a recognized university and must have proficiency in operation of computers. Selection Process: Candidates will be selected based on interview. Application Fee: candidates should pay Rs. 1000/- for General, Reserved Category of other State, Rs. 250/- for SC/ BC/ OBC/ ESM of State of Punjab, Rs. 500/- for General of PHC of Punjab , Rs. 125/- for SC/ BC/ OBC/ ESM of PHC of Punjab candidates (non-refundable) by the way of “Cash Deposit Receipt” printed after completion of Step-I of registration in any Branch of State Bank of India only under Screen 8888 (Fee Type-21). How to Apply: Eligible candidates may apply online through the website www.sssc.gov.in from 20-03-2017 to 18-04-2017 by 11.59 PM for step I registration & for step II registration on or before 21-04-2017 by 11:59 P.M. Instructions to Apply Online: 1. Before applying online candidates should have valid e-mail ID & Contact No. 2. Log on to www.sssc.gov.in 3. Click on “Recruitments——–>Stenographer Grade III (Subordinate Courts of Punjab)” & click on it. 4. Read the notification & Click on Online Registration (Step-I). 5. Fill the details carefully & submit the form. 6. Deposit the fee in the Bank after 24 hours from the time of completion of Registration Step-I. 7. Click on “Login for Second step Registration”. 8. Fill all the mandatory details and submit the form. 9. Take a print out of online application for future use. Important Dates: Starting Date for Online Application 20-03-2017 Last Date/ Time for Registration Step-I 18-04-2017 by 11.59 PM Last Date for Receipt of Application Fee 20-04-2017 (within Banking Hours) Last Date/ Time for Registration Step-II 21-04-2017 by 11:59 P.M Last Date for Editing of Application 21-04-2017 by 11.59 PM Date of Exam May 2017 For more details like qualification, vacancy details, mode of selection & other information click on the link given below….
